education_required: Pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
Pursuing or recently completed a Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology
responsibilities: Assist in developing mobile applications using Flutter.
Collaborate with senior developers and designers to build new features.
Write clean, scalable code and test applications on multiple platforms.
Debug and troubleshoot issues within the Flutter framework and APIs.
Assist in UI/UX design and integration for smooth user experiences.
Work with databases (SQL/MySQL) for app data handling.
Participate in agile sprint meetings and collaborate using tools like Git, GitHub, and Jira.
Improve the functionality and performance of existing mobile apps.
